description: To wear as an outer layer. 'Neida' means inner layer.

examples.chinese: 外搭一件粉色的连帽卫衣,轻盈减龄
examples.translation: Wearing a pink hoodie as an outer layer makes you look light and younger.

examples.chinese: 今天买了漏锁骨的T,外搭衫
examples.translation: Bought a T-shirt showing collarbone today, and an outer shirt.

examples.chinese: 这件短袖夏天也可以当外搭搭配哦
examples.translation: This short sleeve can also be worn as an outer layer in summer.
